name: VIZeBooks
description: an ePublishing solution to visual book p
overview:
App Developers for the Publishing Industry VIZeBooks has been set-up by publisher Angela Patchell, who has over 25 years book and magazine publishing experience.

She develops Applications for the Mobile and Tablet devices with the focus on readability, marketing and the publishing role it needs to meet.

If you need her publishing expertise in developing Applications for your publishing company email her at angie@vizebooks.com.
